frontmatter.title: FluxNews
frontmatter.meta_description: FluxNews is complete app that fully integration Wordpress website

markdownRemark.html:
We will update the list of support features and detailed change logs for every update on this page.

Available features:

v1.0

  1. Great UX design: multi-level categories, quick product filter, super smooth checkout flow, keyword search history…
  2. Flexible homepage config with Banner Slider, Banner Grouping, Flexible product column views.
  3. User Profile which useful setting: push notifications to turn on/off, get unread notifications, view wishlist, order history, rate the app on app stores.
  4. Social Login by Facebook SDK.
  5. Push notifications (with notification history) via Firebase.
  6. Google Analytics via Firebase.
  7. Easy to restyle and theming on your branding sites.
  8. Offline local caching.
  9. Compatible with the latest Wordpress blogs.
  10. Compatible with latest Opencart (with free Free Opencart API is included).
  11. Easy registration with SMS Login by Facebook Account Kit.
  12. Instance synchronization from mobile to the server.
  13. Perfect splash animation by using new Flare.
  14. Working really well on both iOS and Android with support for 60 frames per second (fps).

Planning

v1.1

  • Upgrade product details page.
  • Add more powerful widget.
